import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import socketIOClient from "socket.io-client"; import { User, Target, Edit2, Phone, X } from "react-feather"; const ENDPOINT = "http://localhost:5000"; function EditProfile(props) { const socket = socketIOClient(ENDPOINT); const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [city, setCity] = useState(""); const [phone, setPhone] = useState(""); const [webSite, setWebSite] = useState(""); const [about, setAbout] = useState(""); const [pphoto, setPphoto] = useState(""); console.log(props); let profileInfo; useEffect(() => { if ( props.userProfile && props.userProfile.usrprofile && props.userProfile.usrprofile.length > 0 ) { profileInfo = props.userProfile.usrprofile[0]; setName(profileInfo.name); setCity(profileInfo.city); setPhone(profileInfo.phone); setWebSite(profileInfo.website); setAbout(profileInfo.about); setPphoto(profileInfo.pphoto); } else { profileInfo = ""; } }, [props.userProfile.usrprofile]); function SaveProfile(e) { e.preventDefault(); fetch(`/edProf`, { method: "POST", body: JSON.stringify({ name, city, phone, webSite, about }), }); console.log("si paso"); } console.log(profileInfo); return (

); } export default EditProfile;
